data.title: CityBeat: Cincinnati City Council Bars Employers From Asking About Salary History
data.meta_description: Cincinnati City Council today passed legislation brought by member Tamaya Dennard that bars employers from asking about an...
data.text:
Cincinnati City Council today passed legislation brought by member Tamaya Dennard that bars employers from asking about an applicantâ€™s salary history, a move supporters say would begin to address the wage gap women and minorities face in Cincinnati.

Title: Cincinnati City Council Bars Employers From Asking About Salary History

Author: Nick Swartsell
